home.headline: Generate brandable names with AI
home.sub: Keywords in. Brand-ready names out — Fast. Unique. Available-domain friendly.
home.empty: No names yet — generate some ideas!

about.title: About Nexir
about.p1: Nexir is an AI-powered brand naming studio built for founders, creators, and teams. By combining intelligent keyword analysis with real-time domain availability, Nexir helps you discover distinctive, brand-ready names faster—so you can move from idea to identity with confidence.
about.v1: Clarity: Nexir focuses on relevance, memorability, and intent—not endless, generic options.
about.v2: Originality: Fresh ideas without sounding random.
about.v3: Speed: Great options in seconds, not days.
about.ceoQuote: “Nexir is built to empower builders at every stage with intelligent naming tools that transform ideas into clear, credible, and ownable brands—without friction, guesswork, or wasted time.”
about.missionBody: To help founders turn ideas into clear, credible, and ownable brand identities—fast.
about.visionBody: To become the most trusted AI naming companion for builders worldwide.

card.domainHint: Click “Find available domains” to check .ai, .io, .app and more.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Nexir respects your privacy and does not collect personal data.
privacy.noCollection: No personal information is collected or stored.
privacy.localStorage: Saved names are stored locally in your browser only.
privacy.cookies: Nexir does not use tracking cookies.
privacy.thirdParty: Third-party links may have separate privacy policies.
privacy.contact: Contact us at hello@nexir.io for questions.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service govern your use of Nexir.
terms.section1Body: By accessing or using Nexir, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
terms.section2Body: Nexir is an AI-powered brand name generation platform provided for informational purposes only.
terms.section3Body: Nexir does not provide legal, trademark, or business advice. You are responsible for verifying name availability and suitability.
terms.section4Body: You agree not to misuse the Service or attempt to disrupt its operation.
terms.section5Body: Nexir retains ownership of the platform. Generated names are not guaranteed to be unique or exclusive.
terms.section6Body: The Service is provided “as is” without warranties of any kind. Nexir is not liable for damages arising from use.
terms.section7Body: We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use of the Service constitutes acceptance of changes.
terms.contact: Questions about these Terms can be sent to hello@nexir.io.
